1370: Wlfarde was born in Nieu straet in 1370.
Got married to Baua at age 24 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Baua, Helyana, at age 24.
1371: Had a daughter with Baua, Siburgis, at age 25.
1372: Had a daughter with Baua, Douwen, at age 26.
1374: Lost daughter Douwen when Douwen was 3 years old.
1375: Had a daughter with Baua, Lutghardis, at age 29.
1376: Had a daughter with Baua, Moerseil, at age 30.
Lost daughter Lutghardis when Lutghardis was 2 years old.
1377: Had a daughter with Baua, Mabelie, at age 31.
1379: Had a son with Baua, Vais, at age 33.
1382: Had a son with Baua, Falco, at age 36.
1385: Had a daughter with Baua, Baua, at age 39.
1386: Had a daughter with Baua, Segherarden, at age 40.
Lost daughter Siburgis when Siburgis was 16 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
